glsa.title: Kismet: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Kismet is vulnerable to multiple issues potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Kismet is an 802.11 Layer 2 wireless network detector, sniffer, and intrusion detection system.

description.p: Kismet is vulnerable to a heap overflow when handling pcap captures and to an integer underflow in the CDP protocol dissector.

impact.p: With a specially crafted packet an attacker could cause Kismet to execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the program.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Kismet users should upgrade to the latest version:
